primary.context: Caller appears to be an automated system or recording
primary.detail: The caller played a recorded message instead of stating a request, then disconnected.

steps: Caller played a recording stating no one is available to take the call.
Agent attempted to ask for a name and then checked for presence before the call ended.

failure.detail: The caller was an automated recording/system, not a human customer.

insights.summary: The call was received from an automated system or recording stating no one was available, leading to an immediate abandon.
insights.verbatim: It seems like no one is available to take your call at the moment.
